mapper.select: select p.proc_code AS proc_code , p.proc_flag AS proc_flag , p.proc_emp_id AS proc_emp_id , FN_GET_CODE_NAME(p.proc_code) AS codeName , avg(fs.fac_output) AS fac_output, avg(fs.fac_runtime) AS fac_runtime from process p left join facility_process fp on p.proc_code = fp.proc_code left join facility_status fs on fp.fac_no = fs.fac_no group by p.proc_code, p.proc_flag, p.proc_emp_id order by proc_code
select * from facility_status where fac_no not in ( select fac_no from facility_process)
mapper.insert: insert into common_code ( code, group_code, code_name, code_desct, code_flag, code_etc ) values ( #{procCode}, 'proc', #{codeName}, #{procFlag}, 'Y', #{codeEtc} )
